newsitem.title: USA: IPO FILING - Autocyte registers 3.1 mln shrs.
newsitem.headline: IPO FILING - Autocyte registers 3.1 mln shrs.

text.p: Autocyte Inc. filed Friday with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission to register an initial public offering of up to 3.1 million common shares it expects to sell between $12 and $14 each.
Underwriters for the offering, Dillon Read & Co Inc and UBS Securities, have an over-allotment option of up to 465,000 shares.

The Elon College, N.C. provider of imaging systems for the medical industry said proceeds from the sale will be used to fund sales and marketing activities, research and development, capital expenditures and other general corporate needs.
After the offering, the company will have 12,261,324 common shares outstanding.
